snippet.title: MERGE HAMSTER Grand Opening
snippet.description:
Download Link - https://onelink.to/m3susx

Squeeeak!!! The hamsters are angry!!

An evil force has suddenly appeared in the once peaceful forest of the hamsters, disturbing their tranquility.
Their peaceful days of eating and sleeping have been shattered, and they can no longer tolerate it!
Don’t underestimate them because of their small size! It’s time to show what the hamsters can do!

Merge Hamster is an idle merge game. Recruit hamsters, merge and upgrade various weapons, and protect the forest!

[Hamster Raising Guide]
▶ Tap and Merge!
Merge weapons to create even more powerful ones. There’s no end to the growth of the hamsters!

▶ Recruit Hamsters
Recruit cute and brave hamsters. Hamsters with various abilities and skills will join you!

▶ Hamster Skills
Utilize the various skills of the hamsters to experience even more spectacular battles. Using skills strategically increases your chances of victory in battles.

▶ Fortress Upgrade
Upgrade the fortress where the hamsters live. The better the fortress, the stronger the hamsters become, enhancing their abilities.
Protect the forest with your adorable hamster heroes!
